attributes.action: Let poedophile hunting groups work with police to capture online groomers
attributes.additional_details: We have a lot of hunting groups online what we need is backing and support of our government and police to help catch online groomers who have the intention of harming children we need these online groomers of the streets and we can get them identified by the means of decoys who pose as a young child online chat logs are recorded and a sting is set up lets work together and not agsinst each other please im asking out government and police for help
attributes.background: We need action now to make it possible for hunters to work with police to capture online groomers we’re both party’s cooperate with each other and share information set up stings to catch groomers of children online this is for our children’s safety to get them of the streets

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
